revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=MI424WR |revision=A |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |est_release_date=07/2006 |fcc_id=LNQ802MRG |type=wireless router, FiOS modem |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP425 |cpu1_cspeed=533 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F640J3D-75 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V281620ETP-H |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module=Actiontec 802MRG |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2560 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2525 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Micrel |eth_chip2_model=KSZ8721BL |sw_brand=Micrel |sw_model=KSZ8995MA |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |stock_os=Linux;2.4.21;Jungo OpenRG; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, DD-WRT, LEDE Project, |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=XXXXX,AP2500-A1 |default_ssid_regex=^[A-Z0-9]{5}$,,,^AP2500-A1$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |oui=00:18:01 |oui_eth=00:0F:B3 }} :[http://opensource.actiontec.com/mi424wracd.html GPL Code download center]
The device presumably uses two ''Entropic Communications'' EN2010 :for the coaxial ([http://www.mocalliance.org/ MoCA]) connections.
Switch / PHY P/Ns may vary, older models will likely have ''[[Kendin]]'' branded chips :(see ''SNB'' image) whereas newer devices will probably have [[Micrel]] branded chips
The AP may take on an SSID of '''AP2500-A1''' for a short period of time while :booting or resetting to factory defaults. The default SSID follows a pattern of 5 letters and numbers (example: '''07NJ8''').
*{{TechInfoDepot|Actiontec_MI424WR_rev_A}}
